description.zh-cn: 美籍华裔物理学家，因提出弱相互作用中宇称不守恒理论而与杨振宁共同获得1957年诺贝尔物理学奖。
description.en: A Chinese-American physicist, known for his work on parity non-conservation in weak interaction, for which he and Chen-Ning Yang received the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1957.

description.zh-cn: 华裔物理学家，因提出弱相互作用中宇称不守恒理论而与李政道共同获得1957年诺贝尔物理学奖。
description.en: A Chinese physicist, known for his work on parity non-conservation in weak interaction, for which he and Tsung-Dao Lee received the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1957.

description.zh-cn: 华裔物理学家，她设计的吴氏实验验证了弱相互作用中的宇称不守恒。
description.en: A Chinese-American physicist whose Wu experiment provided experimental proof for parity non-conservation in weak interactions.

description.zh-cn: 一项基础科学原理，指出在弱相互作用中，物理系统在镜像变换下其行为会有所不同。该理论由李政道和杨振宁于1956年提出。
description.en: A fundamental scientific principle stating that the behavior of a physical system can be different from its mirror image in weak interactions. The theory was proposed by Tsung-Dao Lee and Chen-Ning Yang in 1956.

description.zh-cn: 一项由吴健雄及其合作者进行的物理学实验，该实验验证了弱相互作用中宇称不守恒的理论。
description.en: A physics experiment conducted by Chien-Shiung Wu and her collaborators, which verified the theory of parity non-conservation in weak interactions.

description.zh-cn: 诺贝尔奖的一个奖项，旨在奖励在物理学领域做出最重要发现或发明的科学家。
description.en: An award of the Nobel Prize, honoring scientists who have made the most important discoveries or inventions in the field of physics.

description.zh-cn: 意大利裔美国物理学家，以在核反应堆方面的工作而闻名，曾是李政道的博士导师。
description.en: An Italian-American physicist known for his work on nuclear reactors, who was Tsung-Dao Lee's doctoral advisor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、军事家、外交家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese statesman, military leader, and diplomat who served as the first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese communist revolutionary, politician and political theorist, who served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

en: University of Science and Technology of China

nodes.id: 少年班 (中国科学技术大学)

zh-cn: 少年班 (中国科学技术大学)
en: Special Class for the Gifted Young of the University of Science and Technology of China

description.zh-cn: 中国科学技术大学的一个特殊教育项目，旨在为智力超常的青少年提供大学教育。该班级的成立源于李政道向毛泽东的建议。
description.en: A special educational program at the University of Science and Technology of China designed to provide university education for intellectually gifted adolescents. Its establishment was suggested by Tsung-Dao Lee to Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 李政道的妻子。
description.en: Spouse of Tsung-Dao Lee.

zh-cn: 秦惠莙与李政道中国大学生见习进修基金

description.zh-cn: 由李政道及其亲友为纪念其夫人秦惠䇹而设立的基金，旨在支持中国顶尖大学的优秀本科生进行基础科学研究。
description.en: A fund established by Tsung-Dao Lee and his relatives in memory of his wife Hui-Chun Chin, aiming to support outstanding undergraduate students from top Chinese universities in basic science research.

description.zh-cn: 李政道的长子，历史学家。
description.en: Tsung-Dao Lee's elder son, a historian.

description.zh-cn: 李政道的幼子，化学家。
description.en: Tsung-Dao Lee's younger son, a chemist.

description.zh-cn: 李政道之父，金陵大学农化系首届毕业生。
description.en: Father of Tsung-Dao Lee, a graduate of the University of Nanking.

description.zh-cn: 在浙江大学物理系学习，后因日军进入贵州而中断学业。
description.en: Studied in the Department of Physics at Zhejiang University, but his studies were interrupted due to the Japanese invasion of Guizhou.

description.zh-cn: 在浙江大学期间，李政道师从束星北。
description.en: During his time at Zhejiang University, Tsung-Dao Lee studied under Shu Xingbei.

description.zh-cn: 在浙江大学期间，李政道师从王淦昌。
description.en: During his time at Zhejiang University, Tsung-Dao Lee studied under Wang Ganchang.

description.zh-cn: 转学至西南联合大学成为二年级生，后因抗战结束学校停办而未毕业。
description.en: Transferred to National Southwestern Associated University as a sophomore, but did not graduate as the university was dissolved after the war.

description.zh-cn: 在西南联合大学期间，李政道师从吴大猷。
description.en: During his time at National Southwestern Associated University, Tsung-Dao Lee studied under Ta-You Wu.

description.zh-cn: 在西南联合大学期间，李政道师从叶企孙。
description.en: During his time at National Southwestern Associated University, Tsung-Dao Lee studied under Ye Qisun.

description.zh-cn: 在芝加哥大学攻读博士学位期间，师从恩里科·费米。
description.en: Studied under Enrico Fermi while pursuing his Ph.D. at the University of Chicago.

position.zh-cn: 助理教授、教授、名誉教授

description.zh-cn: 李政道与杨振宁在1940年代末开始了亲密而富有成果的合作关系，共同发表了多篇论文。
description.en: Tsung-Dao Lee and Chen-Ning Yang began a close and fruitful collaboration in the late 1940s, co-authoring numerous papers.

description.zh-cn: 自1960年代初合作终止后，两人关系破裂并分道扬镳。
description.en: After their collaboration ended in the early 1960s, their personal relationship broke down and they went their separate ways.

description.zh-cn: 与杨振宁共同发表论文，提出在弱相互作用中宇称可能不守恒。
description.en: Co-authored a paper with Chen-Ning Yang proposing that parity may not be conserved in weak interactions.

description.zh-cn: 与李政道共同发表论文，提出在弱相互作用中宇称可能不守恒。
description.en: Co-authored a paper with Tsung-Dao Lee proposing that parity may not be conserved in weak interactions.

description.zh-cn: 吴氏实验以确凿无疑的证据表明，在弱相互作用过程中宇称守恒定律不成立，验证了李政道和杨振宁的理论。
description.en: The Wu experiment provided conclusive evidence that parity conservation is violated in weak interactions, thus verifying the theory of Lee and Yang.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄在李政道和杨振宁的建议下，设计并领导了吴氏实验。
description.en: At the suggestion of Lee and Yang, Chien-Shiung Wu designed and led the Wu experiment.

description.zh-cn: 因对所谓的宇称不守恒定律的透彻研究，从而导致基本粒子方面的重大发现而授予李政道诺贝尔物理学奖。
description.en: Awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics to Tsung-Dao Lee for his penetrating investigation of the so-called parity laws which has led to important discoveries regarding the elementary particles.

description.zh-cn: 因对所谓的宇称不守恒定律的透彻研究，从而导致基本粒子方面的重大发现而授予杨振宁诺贝尔物理学奖。
description.en: Awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics to Chen-Ning Yang for his penetrating investigation of the so-called parity laws which has led to important discoveries regarding the elementary particles.

description.zh-cn: 李政道访问中国大陆时受到时任国务院总理周恩来的接见。
description.en: During his visit to mainland China, Tsung-Dao Lee was received by then-Premier Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 李政道再次访问中国大陆时受到时任中共中央主席毛泽东的接见。
description.en: During another visit to mainland China, Tsung-Dao Lee was received by then-CPC Chairman Mao Zedong.

relationships.target: 少年班 (中国科学技术大学)

description.zh-cn: 在与毛泽东会面时建议成立大学少年班，对中国的少年天才进行科学培养。
description.en: During his meeting with Mao Zedong, he suggested the establishment of a special university class for gifted youth in China for scientific training.

relationships.target: 少年班 (中国科学技术大学)

description.zh-cn: 同意了李政道关于成立大学少年班的建议，促成了中国科学技术大学少年班的建立。
description.en: Agreed to Tsung-Dao Lee's suggestion to establish a special university class for gifted youth, which led to the creation of the Special Class at the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 为纪念已故夫人秦惠䇹，李政道及其亲友捐款设立䇹政基金。
description.en: To commemorate his late wife Hui-Chun Chin, Tsung-Dao Lee and his relatives donated to establish the Chun-Tsung Endowment.
